message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the inflation effect will make your share worth less over time. Let's get this done!
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Let's split it down the middle. This way, we both get a fair share despite the inflation. I think this is the most reasonable way to resolve this.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not willing to split it evenly. The inflation is hurting me, not you.
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage due to the inflation, but I think we're getting closer to a solution. Let's settle this before the money loses even more value.
